definition: severity (of the case)/degree of seriousness/whether sth is slight or serious
light/easy/gentle/soft/reckless/unimportant/frivolous/small in number/unstressed/neutral/to disparage
heavy/serious/to attach importance to
to repeat/repetition/again/re-/classifier: layer
to play a critical role (idiom)/influential
insignificant
slight or important, urgent or non-urgent (idiom); to deal with important matters first/sense of priority
lit. not knowing what's important (idiom); no appreciation of the gravity of things/naive/doesn't know who's who/no sense of priorities
to invert the importance of things (i.e. stress the unimportant and neglect the important)/lacking a sense of perspective/to put the cart before the horse
slight or important, urgent or non-urgent (idiom); to deal with important matters first/sense of priority/also written 輕重緩急|轻重缓急
lit. to inquire whether the tripods are light or heavy (idiom); a laughable attempt to seize power
to invert the importance of things (i.e. stress the incidental and neglect the main point)/lacking a sense of perspective/to put the cart before the horse

sentences.english: The level of calcification was positive correlation with time of clinical symptom.
sentences.chinese: 钙化的轻重与临床表现出现的早晚成正相关。

sentences.english: City and urban agglomeration are playing a key role in a regional economic development.
sentences.chinese: 城市和城市群在一个区域发展中起着举足轻重的作用。

sentences.english: The other two members of the committee are just featherweight .
sentences.chinese: 委员会的其他两个成员只是无足轻重的人。

sentences.english: Clouds play an important role in the global climate system.
sentences.chinese: 云在全球气候系统中扮演着举足轻重的角色。

sentences.english: Electrocardiographic abnormality was associated with the degree of clinical condition and prognosis.
sentences.chinese: 心电图异常与病情轻重及预后密切相关。

sentences.english: Research and application of such master models are prevailing in the industry now.
sentences.chinese: 主模型的研制和应用已日益显示出举足轻重的地位。

sentences.english: These young people do not know the proper way to act.
sentences.chinese: 这些年轻人做事情不知轻重。

sentences.english: Here's just some lame extra footy.
sentences.chinese: 这里的只是一些跛脚的额外无足轻重。

sentences.english: The new Baiyun Airport takes an important role in the Guangzhou municipal construction.
sentences.chinese: 新白云机场在广州城市建设中具有举足轻重的地位。

sentences.english: In this prison he is a heavy hitter.
sentences.chinese: 在这个监狱里，他可是个举足轻重的人物。

sentences.english: Serve the citizens in order of priority and urgency on practical affair, take the easiest the first .
sentences.chinese: 我们为市民办实事要分轻重缓急，先易后难。

sentences.english: He just laughed, and dismissed the question as unimportant.
sentences.chinese: 他只是笑了笑，认为问题无足轻重而不予考虑。

sentences.english: South-Pearl was playing a decisive role in our country′s pearl industry.
sentences.chinese: 在我国珍珠产业中，南珠具有举足轻重的地位。

sentences.english: The medical ethics construction has the pivotal function in the hospital management work.
sentences.chinese: 医德建设在医院管理工作中具有举足轻重的作用。

sentences.english: When collective security is at stake, public opinion can carry great weight.
sentences.chinese: 当涉及集体的安全时，舆论是举足轻重的。

sentences.english: When this book first came out, critics called her a lightweight.
sentences.chinese: 当她出版了第一本书时评论家们说她无足轻重。

definition: slight or important, urgent or non-urgent (idiom); to deal with important matters first/sense of priority
priority/whether sth is urgent

deep or shallow/depth (of the sea)/limits of decorum
to advance or retreat/knowing when to come and when to leave/a sense of propriety
propriety/appropriate behavior/proper speech or action/within the norms
lit. crooked and straight/fig. right and wrong, good and evil
number/amount
length/duration/accident/right and wrong/good and bad/long and short
strong or weak/intensity/amount of force or pressure
to grasp/(dialect) affecting shyness/coy/to create difficulties
the important and the less important/primary and secondary
what is true and what is false/(to get to know) the real situation
to distinguish (between different things)/to make distinctions clear
to choose/to accept or reject
close and distant (relatives)
